onyomiExamples.meaning: 8th in rank, eighth sign of the Chinese calendar
Siebold's wild ginger (esp. its dried root or rhizome, used as an antitussive and analgesic in traditional Chinese medicine)

kunyomiExamples.meaning: spicy, hot, salty, harsh (criticism), severe (punishment), strict, painful, bitter, difficult, tough
painful, bitter, heart-breaking, difficult (emotionally), tough, difficult, hard (usu. of situations), cruel, harsh, cold
to have a hard time of it
8th in rank, eighth sign of the Chinese calendar
Metal Rabbit (28th year of the sexagenary cycle, e.g. 1951, 2011, 2071)
